title: TripAdvisor API/Scraper input
description: To unleash the full power of the scraper/API use the options bellow!

locationFullName.title: Location
locationFullName.description: Location name as you would enter to TripAdvisor search. Actor takes the first result as desired location. Input countries, cities, neighborhoods

maxItems.title: Max search results
maxItems.description: Limit the number of places to be scraped. Use '0' to not limit the number of places scraped
